Class ImageButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement
      • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.Button
        • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.ImageButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actionable, Hoverable

    public class ImageButton
extends Button
    Implementation of Button that only contains an image
